comment: I got 1.065 on my OG and i reached 1.010 on my FG giving this beer a 7.2% ABV. This is now sitting on 2 oz of hops, 1 Lb of fresh peaches and 4 oz of fresh cypress wood that i lightly toasted. The hops and fruit will sit for seven days. The wood will be removed in 3 days so it doesn't over power the final product.
